events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request due to incorrect item delivery.
An agent specializing in refunds has been assigned to handle the case promptly.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear about the issue with your order. Iâ€™m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and any photos of the received wrong item to proceed with your refund?
Sure, my order number is 123456789, and I have attached pictures showing that the item sent was not what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method and arrange for a free return shipping label.
That sounds good, thank you for your quick response and clear instructions on how to return the item.
The refund process has been completed and the return label sent to your email. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
We are checking in to confirm that you received your refund and the return process went smoothly. Please feel free to reach out with any questions.
